int CMenu::setAutoItemsWidthOn ( )
 

Make all items the same width

int CMenu::setAutoItemsWidthOff ( )
 

The width of each menu item is used

Referenced by STANDARD_CONSTRUCTORS().

int CMenu::setAutoDestroyOn ( )
 

Destroy menu on closing. The menu might be destroyed before the selected menu item's callback is invoked.

int CMenu::setAutoDestroyOff ( )
 

Don't destroy menu on closing

int CMenu::setOverrideParentOn ( )
 

Allow this menu to override its parent menu.

int CMenu::setOverrideParentOff ( )
 

Don't allow this menu to override its parent menu.

The menu title. If you want to remove a title, specify NULL.
